title: Total population of Iraq 2024
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Inhabitants in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
Overall Inhabitants in millions has increased over the Year.
Inhabitants in millions is roughly constant from 2014 to 2015, and lastly slightly increasing from 2015 to 2024.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2023 and 2024.
The highest Inhabitants in millions, of value 44.47 was reached at Year 2024
The lowest Inhabitants in millions, of value 35.0 was reported at Year 2014
